dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, consisting of read English speech.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: R. Schl端ter

dcterms:description: Gammatone features apply a Gammatone filterbank to the pre-emphasized speech signal, performing temporal integration and normalization.
dcterms:title: Gammatone features

dcterms:creator: R. Schl端ter
I. Bezrukov
H. Wagner
H. Ney
dcterms:description: Log Mel filterbank features are computed from the short time Fourier transform of the waveform, applying Mel warping and normalization.
dcterms:title: Log Mel filterbank features

dcterms:creator: Z. T端ske

dcterms:description: Supervised Convolutional features apply a convolutional filterbank with learnable parameters to the waveform, allowing for multi-resolutional processing.
dcterms:title: SC features
